== Muthukulam (CT) (628263) ==

Muthukulam (CT) is a town in the [[Karthikappally]] taluka of [[Alappuzha]] district with an area of 11.58 sq. km. and harbouring 5692 households with total population of 20740 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Alappuzha]] is at a distance of 30 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 120 km. Male population is 9474 and female population is 11266. Scheduled Caste population is 2065 and Scheduled Tribes population is 51. Census Location Code of the town is 628263<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Alappuzha (m + og) at a distance of 30 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 96 km. Railway station is at Kayamkulam at a distance of 10 km.
